channel.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
channel.description:
What's up noobs?
I'm currently working on a brand new Cool RuneScape client, and I call it CoolRSClient. It's still a little buggy, but I'm coming up with the final release pretty soon.
I might make this Open source, I'm still thinking about it if I should.
[b]Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Play in FULLSCREEN with a Non-Member account.[/li] [li]Check price of an Item using the Grand Exchange price checker.[/li] [li]If Grand Exchange price checker gives you a wrong item when you type it's Name, you can use the Item ID database and type the Item ID instead of it's name. Item DB includes all items from RuneScape's 660 update.[/li] [li]MULTIPLE LOGINS into ONE WORLD with two or more accounts at a time, this can help you with trading items between your accounts, like if you have two accounts, one is member, and the other one used to be member, but is free, but you have an abyssal whip only on the free, you can use this feature to easily move the abyssal whip to your members account. (This feature seems to be quite buggy, so I will not include it in the first release, until I finally get it to work properly. I haven't tried in Safe Mode yet, but I will be trying that.)[/li] [li]Supports the NEW FACEBOOK LOGIN.* When you press Facebook login, CoolRSClient will open Safari or Firefox, or whatever is your default browser, so that you can authenticate using Facebook.[/li][/ul]
[size=6pt]*Feature available only on Mac OS X computers.[/size]
Screenshot attached. Tell me what you think of it.
[b]Private Beta is open. Text for details +1 (646) 600-8557.[/b] I might not reply until 4:30 AM, on 11th August, I will be travelling to Hong Kong for the 15 hours before that time, and you know, the stupid flight attendants say shut your phone off. It's a textfree.us number so I don't get charged extra for roaming. Check textfree out at www.pinger.com/textfree. (iPhone and iPod touch only)
[b]Request the Private beta from ME ONLY. [u]Do not download a leaked copy from anywhere else.[/u][/b]
[size=4pt]i<3cm[/size]

item.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

SETO:

i don’t know if you know this…you can already playfull screen as a non-member on the runescape website

I guess fullscreen means literally fullscreen, not just something that fills the browser from one side to the other.

Read full topic

I’m going to call this kid xD

item.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:10, topic:409231”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=510507.msg3704731#msg3704731 date=1312952052]

Looks nice, you should probably release it open source though other wise you will get people flaming its a virus for no reason.
[/quote]Or it could actually be a virus?

I remember something similar being posted on MITB, a client with all the commands enabled (that are client sided), it did everything it was supposed to, but it also sent the guy your password

The commands were also completely useless iirc :P[/quote]They were pretty cool actually, zooming out and stuff (no real hacks though), but the stealing your password part was a let down

Read full topic

item.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

B2300 T4nk:

Why did you put your phone number??? Nonetheless I’m looking forward to the release.

who put there number?

also the only the new accounts use the email as the login, and ur facebook and RS account can have 2 different emails. im pretty sure you can set the visibility to ur email to off(like mine u can not see my email unless ur my friend i guess, or at least u cant not being signed in).

if u have a strong password, u dont tell anyone ur password, and they dont keylog you then u arent going to get hack, b/c its going to take forever for someone to bruteforce it especially if its max characters, and the max attempts to login for your location(probably a very simple way to get arround this though), b4 you have to wait 15 mins. im not sure if u can use symbols in your password but using a mixture of symbols, numbers, and letter upper and lowercase, and not using words found in the dictionary makes very strong passwords(if u have a keylogger it doesnt really matter how strong ur pass is though.) and example would be 1!GfX47w0MgK@7 = to remeber 11 graphics(shortened) ftw(obscured) omg cat alternating between uppercase and lowercase letters, and replacing letters with numbers or symbols when possible(0mg), and spelling words differently then they are normally spelled(kat). and u can make a pattern with using the shift.

Read full topic

item.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Why did you put your phone number??? Nonetheless I’m looking forward to the release.

item.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

xryz,

Your email is opened up to the public, thus your login. The only thing stopping someone is the password. Which is just as simple.

Read full topic

item.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Morons logging in with facebook. So easy to be “hacked”.

if u keep a secure password, not let any app have access to ur account, and not let anyone know ur credentials there isnt a reason its easier to hack than not using FB login. so using fb login is no easier to hack than not using it.

@muroth question how do u recover an account with facebook?

Read full topic

item.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Siggi88:

All I do is click Login with Facebook, because I’m already logged into Facebook, so I don’t even have to do a single thing, it just lets me play.

I’ve recovered 12 accounts so far

Read full topic

item.title: CoolRSClient coming soon!
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

i actually log in with facebook on my main its convenient, click one button and when the client loads all u have to do is choose what world to play on. i have fullscreen on non members through my chrome browser, i made a userscript that allows it to be fullscreen, idk if it throughs flags to jagex that i removed the adds or not but i havent been warned or anything so ya. but the GE checker is nice. for multilogining in to the same world i just use a bot like rsbuddy, my cousin and I went to clan wars with 2-3 accounts each and versed other clans it was pretty funny 2 ppl fighting like 5 ppl but with 5 v 5 rs account

Read full topic
